response.original_title: 世にも恐ろしい心霊動画
response.overview: With the cooperation of a certain publishing company, we have succeeded in obtaining a number of videos that for various reasons have never come to light. These are the so-called videos sealed in the dark. The videos were of various genres, such as disasters that befell relatives, matters related to life and death, crime scenes, and psychic phenomena that were accidentally captured on film. We have released the images for which we were able to obtain permission from the filmmakers or master image holders.
response.title: The Most Terrifying Supernatural Videos in the World

titles.title: 世にも恐ろしい心霊動画 Schneider Poltergeist Company
